Sequence Information.Source: Japanese paper wasp,Polistes snelleni, insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals

Literature.Author: Lin D, Sutherland D, Aninta SI, Louie N, Nip KM, Li C, Yanai A, Coombe L, Warren RL, Helbing CC, Hoang LMN, Birol I. 2022
Literature.Title: Mining Amphibian and Insect Transcriptomes for Antimicrobial Peptide Sequences with rAMPage

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (50%) toDP-1L= 29%, K=24%, A=S=12%; GRAVY:  0.447; M Wt:  1872.377; Mol formula: C85H159N21O22S1; Mol ex coeff: 0.Activity: Active against E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 64-128 ug/ml), S.enteritidis (MIC 128 ug/ml), and S.aureus ATCC 29213 (MIC 128 ug/ml).Toxicity: porcine RBC: HC50 >128 ug/ml.Updated 12/2022; 12/2023
